text:
Sick of trying every skincare product to see what works? Listen to Lily!

Lily Collins always looks stunning, whether she is strutting down the red carpet or downtown L.A. How does she do it? Lily finally revealed her skincare secret!

While promoting her movie Okja at the Cannes Film Festival in France, Lily disclosed all her insights about looking good for the camera and herself! She notes that taking good care of your hair and skin is essential. Even though you lead a busy life juggling your work and social life, remember to take time to take care of yourself!

Lily credits the Lance Energie de Vie The Smoothing & Plumping Water-Infused Cream for maintaining healthy skin.

The moisturizer is sold at any notable make up store for around $55. The product energizes the skin, leaving it feeling nourished and looking revitalized with a glow! Lily also claims it brightens her face and the finishes aren’t sticky! The cream is made with gogi berry, lemon balm, and Vitamin E and can be applied in the morning and evening!

With your everyday pressures, lack of sleep, and pollution, you need to try Lily Collins’ recommended moisturizer! Lily believes it is a “medicine cabinet” essential!
